mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "在庫情報" ( "場所コード", "品目コード", "在庫数量", "合格数", "不良数", "未検査数", "作成者", "更新者", "バージョン" ) VALUES ( #{locationCode}, #{itemCode}, #{stockQuantity}, #{passedQuantity}, #{defectiveQuantity}, #{uninspectedQuantity}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy}, #{version} )
mapper.update: UPDATE "在庫情報" SET "在庫数量" = #{stockQuantity}, "合格数" = #{passedQuantity}, "不良数" = #{defectiveQuantity}, "未検査数" = #{uninspectedQuantity}, "更新日時" = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, "更新者" = #{updatedBy} WHERE "ID" = #{id}

UPDATE "在庫情報" SET "在庫数量" = #{stock.stockQuantity}, "合格数" = #{stock.passedQuantity}, "不良数" = #{stock.defectiveQuantity}, "未検査数" = #{stock.uninspectedQuantity}, "更新日時" = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, "更新者" = #{stock.updatedBy}, "バージョン" = "バージョン" + 1 WHERE "ID" = #{stock.id} AND "バージョン" = #{expectedVersion}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM "在庫情報" WHERE "場所コード" = #{locationCode}
SELECT * FROM "在庫情報" WHERE "品目コード" = #{itemCode}
SELECT * FROM "在庫情報" ORDER BY "場所コード", "品目コード"
